translations: v.（使）感到羞耻；（使）受圣伤痕（stigmase 的过去式及过去分词，stigmatise 等于 stigmatize）

sentences.sentence: As in many other countries, this has long been stigmatised.
sentences.translation: 与其他很多国家一样，这早已为人所不齿。

sentences.sentence: Leave aside the most obvious one - that a child who goes into the playground as gender neutral will quickly be stigmatised.
sentences.translation: 先不谈最明显的一个——孩子去玩的时候，性别中立孩子很快会被同化。

sentences.sentence: As in many other countries, this has long been stigmatised. Depression is beginning to be more widely recognised as a sickness.
sentences.translation: 在很多国家这个观念已经被接受：抑郁症开始被广泛认为是一种疾病。
